alert.note: Alert for Boone; Kanawha; Northwest Fayette; Northwest Raleigh (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 6:53AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Kanawha, northwestern Raleigh, west central Fayette and central Boone Counties through 730 AM EDT... At 653 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Madison, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Madison, Montgomery, Cedar Grove, East Bank, Glasgow, Pratt, Van, Burnwell, Powellton, Danville, Whitesville, Handley, Sylvester, Seth, Leewood, Dawes, Prenter, Sharon, Eskdale and Foster. This includes the following highways... West Virginia Turnpike between mile markers 61 and 85. Route 119 between mile markers 51 and 53. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
